account_takeover.name: AccountTakeover
account_takeover.description: Labs focused on exploiting account takeover vulnerabilities.

BruteForce.description: In this lab, your challenge is to take over the admin@iha089.org account by identifying and exploiting vulnerabilities in the authentication mechanism through brute force techniques.

ImproperAccessControl.description: This lab has a Host Header Injection vulnerability in its password reset mechanism. Exploit it to intercept the reset token and take over the account.

ATO_via_XSS.description: The XSSATO Lab login page is vulnerable to XSS, allowing attackers to inject scripts to steal users' usernames and passwords.

ATO_via_CORS.description: The corsATO Lab has a CORS vulnerability, allowing attackers to steal sensitive data from other origins.

ATO_via_IDOR.description: The IDORATO Lab's Forgot Password page is vulnerable to IDOR (Insecure Direct Object Reference).
